# Chicago Film Critics Association Awards 2007

20th CFCA Awards
December 13, 2007
----
Best Film:
No Country for Old Men
The 20th Chicago Film Critics Association Awards, given by the CFCA on December 13, 2007, honored the best in film for 2007.
